channel.title: using on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in using on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-02
item.description: Google Soli Radar sees your intentions – and it’s less creepy and more helpful than you think (3 minute read) Google’s ATAP group recently unveiled its latest Soli Radar research project.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-19
item.description: Microsoft to acquire Activision Blizzard for $68.7 billion (3 minute read) Microsoft is acquiring Activision Blizzard in a deal valued at $68.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-27
item.description: Exclusive: This is our first look at Android 13 “Tiramisu” and some of its upcoming features (5 minute read) A source with access to a very early Android 13 build has shared screenshots showing several upcoming features and changes.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-17
item.description: Meta’s sci-fi haptic glove prototype lets you feel VR objects using air pockets (6 minute read) Meta has revealed a pair of haptic gloves that lets people feel objects in virtual reality.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-12
item.description: Spotify is acquiring an audiobook company (3 minute read) Spotify has announced plans to acquire Findaway for an undisclosed price.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-04
item.description: Facebook skirts Apple’s App Store fees with custom subscription links for creators (3 minute read) Facebook creators will soon be able to share custom web links to direct their fans to pay for subscriptions using Facebook’s native payments system.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-03
item.description: Microsoft Teams enters the metaverse race with 3D avatars and immersive meetings (4 minute read) Microsoft is integrating Mesh directly into Microsoft Teams.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-15
item.description: Microsoft to shut down LinkedIn in China (1 minute read) Microsoft will shut down its local version of LinkedIn in China due to a significantly more challenging operating environment and greater compliance requirements.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-05
item.description: Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, and Oculus are down. Here’s what we know (2 minute read) Facebook and all of its services went down today.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-27
item.description: Yahoo has built a new calendar app called Day, and it’s recruited the co-founder of Sunrise to design it (3 minute read) Day is a new standalone calendar app from Yahoo.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-20
item.description: Cameo launches Cameo Calls, a service for fans to video chat with celebs (2 minute read) Cameo Calls lets fans chat one-on-one with influencers and celebrities.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-07
item.description: Amazon is reportedly planning to release an Amazon-branded TV as soon as October (1 minute read) Amazon is planning to release Amazon-branded TVs as soon as October in the US.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-26
item.description: Google parent Alphabet launches Intrinsic: a new company to build software for industrial robots (3 minute read) Intrinsic is a new company from Alphabet that focuses on building software for industrial robots.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-22
item.description: Clubhouse is no longer invite-only (2 minute read) Clubhouse is no longer invite-only.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-08
item.description: Hacker shows what Tesla Full Self-Driving’s vision depth perception neural net can see (2 minute read) A hacker who managed to get root access to a Tesla vehicle has unveiled Tesla’s vision depth perception neural net.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-11
item.description: How to watch the debut of Tesla Model S Plaid, the ‘quickest production car ever made’ (4 minute read) Tesla revealed a new high-performance Plaid version of the Model S on Thursday on a livestream.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-07
item.description: Facebook’s ‘Bulletin’ newsletter platform could launch before the end of June (2 minute read) Facebook’s newsletter subscription service Bulletin could be launched before the end of June.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-04
item.description: Waymo’s driverless taxi service can now be accessed on Google Maps (2 minute read) Waymo One can now be accessed and booked through Google Maps.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-13
item.description: Elon Musk says Tesla will stop accepting bitcoin for car purchases, citing environmental concerns (3 minute read) Tesla has suspended vehicle purchases using bitcoin due to concerns over the increasing use of fossil fuels for bitcoin mining.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-28
item.description: Apple’s M2 chip has entered production and will ship as soon as July (2 minute read) Apple’s custom-designed M2 chips entered production this month.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-12
item.description: Elon Musk’s brain-chip company, Neuralink, released a video of a monkey playing video games with its mind (3 minute read) Neuralink released a video last week that showed a macaque monkey using wireless neural interface tech to play video games.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-09
item.description: YouTube is once again the most popular social media platform (2 minute read) YouTube and Facebook are the most dominant social media platforms in the US.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-31
item.description: Snap Plans Hardware Push With AR Spectacles, Drone (1 minute read) Snap’s next-gen Spectacles will be able to layer Snapchat lenses onto the surrounding environment without using a smartphone’s camera.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-11
item.description: Facebook is reportedly working on a Clubhouse copy (1 minute read) Facebook is in the early stages of developing a Clubhouse clone.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-08
item.description: We should be teleporting, not transporting: Mark Zuckerberg; Hints Facebook Labs working on it in Clubhouse chat show (3 minute read) Mark Zuckerberg detailed Facebook’s progress in virtual reality (VR) and augmented reality (AR) in a Clubhouse meeting recently.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-05
item.description: Google Pixel phones will soon track heart rate using only the camera (3 minute read) Google’s latest Pixel-exclusive feature is the ability to track heart rate and respiratory rate using only the existing cameras.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-01
item.description: Apple just paid a record $25 million to buy a Sundance movie (2 minute read) Apple paid roughly $25 million for a movie at the Sundance Film Festival, the largest deal ever at the event.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-26
item.description: Tesla partners with Samsung on new 5nm chip for full self-driving, report says (2 minute read) A report from Korea says that Tesla is partnering with Samsung to develop a 5-nanometer chip for self-driving.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-22
item.description: Pebble founder launches Beeper, a universal chat app that works with iMessage and others (4 minute read) Beeper is a new app that can connect with 15 different messaging services.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-12
item.description: Samsung’s CES 2021 robots will clean your house and pour you a glass of wine (6 minute read) Samsung unveiled three new robots at its virtual CES press conference on Monday.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-11
item.description: Apple, Hyundai set to agree electric car tie-up (2 minute read) Hyundai Motor and Apple Inc are planning to sign a partnership deal on autonomous electric cars by March.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-07
item.description: Microsoft Could Bring You Back From The Dead… As A Chat Bot (1 minute read) Microsoft has filed a patent for a method that would use social data such as images, voice data, social media posts, and other written media to build a profile of a person and create a chatbot with the personality of that person.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-28
item.description: Tesla’s new Boombox feature will let car owners fart at unsuspecting neighbors (2 minute read) Tesla has rolled out its 2020.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-01
item.description: ‘It will change everything’: DeepMind’s AI makes gigantic leap in solving protein structures (8 minute read) DeepMind’s AlphaFold can determine a protein’s 3D shape using its amino-acid sequence.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-24
item.description: Snapchat launches a TikTok-like feed called Spotlight, kick-started by paying creators (5 minute read) Spotlight is Snapchat’s new TikTok-like feed that lets users watch short, entertaining videos in a vertically scrollable video format.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-06
item.description: WhatsApp now lets you post ephemeral messages that disappear after 7 days (4 minute read) WhatsApp users can now mark messages to disappear after seven days.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-05
item.description: Virgin Hyperloop selects West Virginia to test its futuristic transport system (2 minute read) Virgin Hyperloop One will build a $500 million certification center in West Virginia.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-19
item.description: Nokia wins NASA contract to put a 4G network on the moon (1 minute read) Nokia has been awarded a $14.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-15
item.description: Zoom is releasing a new tool to let paid users charge for admission to online events like conferences or fitness classes (3 minute read) OnZoom is Zoom’s new online event hosting platform.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-13
item.description: The Pentagon Wants Elon Musk to Yeet Cargo Around the Planet In an Hour (2 minute read) The Pentagon has contracted SpaceX to develop rockets to deliver packages around the planet in under an hour.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-12
item.description: iPhone 12 lineup’s pricing and release dates detailed in new leak (3 minute read) Details about what Apple could announce at its October 13th event have been leaked.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-28
item.description: Tesla’s full self-driving Autopilot beta coming in ‘a month or so’ (2 minute read) Elon Musk recently announced that Tesla will release a private beta of the full self-driving version of its Autopilot software in the coming months.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-22
item.description: Microsoft purchases Bethesda Softworks in industry-changing acquisition (3 minute read) Microsoft has announced that it is buying the corporate parents of Bethesda Softworks, ZeniMax Media.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-16
item.description: Here’s everything Apple just announced (9 minute read) Apple has announced a new virtual fitness service, a subscription service called Apple One, and a new lineup of Apple Watches and iPads.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-10
item.description: Spotify are reportedly working on a new karaoke feature (1 minute read) Spotify is working on a Karaoke Mode that will feature lyrics and adjustable vocal levels for songs.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-08
item.description: Minecraft is coming to PlayStation VR as a free upgrade later this month (1 minute read) Minecraft will be playable for free on PlayStation VR later this month.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-07
item.description: Driving the Polestar 2, the first electric car with a brain by Google (8 minute read) The Polestar 2 is a new luxury electric vehicle from Volvo.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-24
item.description: Elon Musk reveals Boring tunnels as he aims to eliminate city traffic (3 minute read) Elon Musk has revealed renders of the first commercial station being built by his tunnel-digging company.
